        Jump Shot	100%	1	0	0	-	-	1	0	1	0%	0%	0%	0%	0%	0%
        To Basket	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-
        Drop Step	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-
        Up and Under	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-

      Right Shoulder - Dribble	100%	1	0	0	-	-	1	0	1	0%	0%	0%	0%	0%	0%
      Right Shoulder - No Dribble	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-

        Defender Into Pick	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-
